name: Graffiti Removal Service
description:
Story:

Oh my! The great and awesome Latvian president Levits is visiting our country! The government has deduced 60000000 Euros to clean up all the graffiti! Your the man for the job! You'll get paid 300 EUR! Or be put into the jail for not doing you duty! Clean up all the graffiti before president Levits arrives!
